title: Sensors& Instrumentation
description: A study of basic concepts and design of electronic sensors and instrumentation used in biomedical measurements. Standard clinical measurement techniques will also be examined.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (BMED 2300 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or BMED 2310 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) and ECE 2025 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and ECE 3741 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and (CEE 3770 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ISYE 3770 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 3770 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or BMED 2400 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D)
